data.title: Saif Ali Khan reveals why his first marriage to Amrita Singh was broken
data.meta_description: Bollywood marriages and divorce are common. The sooner the marriage takes place here, the sooner it breaks down. Famous actors Saif Ali Khan... | News Track
data.text:
Bollywood marriages and divorce are common. The sooner the marriage takes place here, the sooner it breaks down. Famous actors Saif Ali Khan and Amrita Singh had a similar relationship. The two got married in 1991. There was a gap of 12 years between the two but they married voluntarily without worrying about it. Thereafter, two children became parents to Sara Ali Khan and Ibrahim Ali Khan.

Soon soured saif and amrita's relationship and they divorced after 13 years of marriage. There were many speculations as to why the divorce took place between the two. It was reported that Saif's growing closeness to Rosa Catalonia led to a rift in the relationship, stating that Saif himself had openly discussed divorce with Amrita in an interview and cited the reason why his relationship broke down forever. According to media reports, Saif had said in an interview that Amrita's behaviour had changed towards her and her family. She insulted his mother, Sharmila Tagore, sister Soha and Saba and spoke to her badly.

Not only that, according to Saif, Amrita used to taunt and insult him constantly. Every moment she made her realize that she was a bad husband and a bad father. Disturbed by these things, he divorced Amrita. Saif married Kareena Kapoor for the second time after many years of divorce from Amrita. The two had also been in a live-in relationship till a few years before their marriage. Saif-Kareena now has two sons named Taimur Ali Khan and Jahangir Ali Khan.
